Articles.Content:
So, I started working on some parts that would make my life easier on certain missions, main condition is to keep it stock-balanced. At the moment I'm working with a mini-nerva engine, and I want to know what do you think about it.

Instead of renders I took the most horrible pictures so that you can criticize it. Keep in mind that it is a 1.25m part.

That's pretty much it, as you can see I kept the poly as low as possible.

Move the ring around the neck of the nozzle down a bit, that is there to cool the nozzle. I think.

You could also add on a nozzle extension since nozzles for engines used in vacuum would be pretty long.

Move the ring around the neck of the nozzle down a bit, that is there to cool the nozzle. I think.

You could also add on a nozzle extension since nozzles for engines used in vacuum would be pretty long.

Like this?
Yep! Round it out a bit more to get that nice bell shape and it'll look great.
Leave it Gold and build some other parts of the same color so we can build our own Bling Rocket or a small monument. XD

Leave it Gold and build some other parts of the same color so we can build our own Bling Rocket or a small monument. XD

It's not gold, it's one of 3ds max default colors for objects, anyways, making it gold would take no time.
